body_html:
Ok I agree parsing spec should be handled separately. I put together a PR here #20860.

I will add unit tests but first want to make sure that is aligned with how you are thinking about it?

Also should I move _sequence_length_from_dense_tensor into tensorflow/python/feature_column/feature_column.py since that is where _sequence_length_from_sparse_tensor is located? Or keep it in this file?
body_text:
Ok I agree parsing spec should be handled separately. I put together a PR here #20860.
I will add unit tests but first want to make sure that is aligned with how you are thinking about it?
Also should I move _sequence_length_from_dense_tensor into tensorflow/python/feature_column/feature_column.py since that is where _sequence_length_from_sparse_tensor is located? Or keep it in this file?
body:
Ok I agree parsing spec should be handled separately. I put together a PR here https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/20860.

I will add unit tests but first want to make sure that is aligned with how you are thinking about it?

Also should I move `_sequence_length_from_dense_tensor` into `tensorflow/python/feature_column/feature_column.py` since that is where [`_sequence_length_from_sparse_tensor`](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/feature_column/feature_column.py#L3375-L3387) is located? Or keep it in this file?
